definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.chinese: 露西有一條漂亮的裙子。

sentences.english: An open war between Sweden and Russia broke out in 1554.
sentences.chinese: 1554年，瑞典同露西亞公開爆發戰爭。

sentences.english: Barbara and Raynor stopped dancing and went across to Lucia at the door.
sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉和雷諾停住了跳舞，穿過露西婭走到門邊。

sentences.english: I had two dances with Lucy.
Lucia was shopping when she suddenly bumped into her old friend Debra.
sentences.chinese: 露西亞購物時碰上了老朋友黛布拉。

sentences.english: Lucy is too young to dress herself.
sentences.chinese: 露西太小了，不能給自己穿衣服。

sentences.english: Lily has already finished his homework, so has Lucy.
sentences.chinese: 同麗莉一樣，露西也完成了她的家庭作業。

sentences.english: Take this to Grandma, Little Lucy.
sentences.chinese: 小露西，把這個帶給奶奶。

sentences.english: "Guard the opening, you two, " Kurt ordered Lucy and Tom.
sentences.chinese: “守衛開口，你們兩個，”庫爾特命令露西和湯姆。

sentences.english: I can't tell Lucy and Lily apart.
Any night. Lucille and I'd love to have you.
sentences.chinese: 露西爾和我將會很高興同你們共進晚餐的。

sentences.english: David and Lucy sat in the prow of the fishing boat and looked across the choppy water.
sentences.chinese: 大衛和露西坐在漁船船頭，凝望着煙波浩淼的水面。

sentences.english: I was no longer Lucy who knew what was best for everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 我不再是知道那個神通廣大的露西了。

sentences.english: Her father pays for her rent and board but Lucy keeps herself in clothes.
sentences.chinese: 露西的父親負擔她的喫住，她自己則掙錢添置衣服。

sentences.english: Han Meimei wanted Lucy to see her parents.
sentences.chinese: 韓美美想要露西見她的父母。

definition: Rowling (name)/Joanne Kathleen Rowling (1965-), author of the Harry Potter series of novels
